Articles.Content: I know theres the F3 menu, but that only helps so far. I'm trying to do the dragster challenge and I want some sort of slow motion mode to see WHY it's crashing, I see the how, but not the why and it happens so fast that I can't see how it starts.
I agree- there was a mod for this, but it doesn't work in 1.0 (I know because I tried it today, got a black Kerbin).

> 
> I agree- there was a mod for this, but it doesn't work in 1.0 (I know because I tried it today, got a black Kerbin).

What IS the mod though?

> 
> [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/69363-0-25-Time-Control-9-23-14-v13-2](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/69363-0-25-Time-Control-9-23-14-v13-2)

Thanks

It looked like the author was working on it, but the last github activity was two months ago.

I've been using this, it still works in 1.02

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85926-0-24-BetterTimeWarp-v1-1](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85926-0-24-BetterTimeWarp-v1-1)
